Class Warlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • cardsMechanics.AbstractCard
      • cardsMechanics.Warlock

    public class Warlock
extends AbstractCard
implements Card
    A class that represent the Warlock type of card.
    Author:
    T Ismael Verdugo
    See Also:

      • actOnMe

        public void actOnMe(Card card)
        Description copied from interface: Card
        makes this card be the object on which the card passed as parameter interact.

        this method is used to derivate the actOn method to the method of the card passed as a parameter that act over an specific type of card.

        when this card is out of combat, the actions made by this card are ignored or do nothing

        Specified by:
        actOnMe in interface Card
        Parameters:
        card - the card that makes the action over this object
        See Also:
        Card.actOnAssasin(Assassin), Card.actOnDruid(Druid), Card.actOnHealer(Healer), Card.actOnHunter(Hunter), Card.actOnKnight(Knight), Card.actOnMage(Mage), Card.actOnPaladin(Paladin), Card.actOnShaman(Shaman), Card.actOnWarlock(Warlock)
